modName: Castle Volkihar Passage to Courtyard for Dawnguard sided players
summary: A small mod to make a passage way for Dawnguard sided players who want to live in castle Volkihar.
descriptionHtml:
[color=white][size=5][b]Castle Volkihar Passage to Courtyard for Dawnguard sided players:[/b][/size][/color]

I got a request to make a separate mod to clear up the passage way to the Volkihar Courtyard so here it is. I will not be updating this mod unless there are major bugs ( I can\'t see why it would bug though)!

For the full mod to turn Castle Volkihar into a Vampire hunter base see the full mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32970]here.[/url]
[img=400x200]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/32970-1-1362743386.png[/img]

I will provide passage to the courtyard quickly in the main file of the main mod but right now I am working on the Keep and adding NPCs so if you really want access to the courtyard with the main mod just install this file to for now until I update the main mod.

Check out my other mods at: 

College Of Winterhold Glory days 
[img=400x200]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/32917-1-1362650606.jpg[/img]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32917]College Of Winterhold Glory days [/url]

Castle Volkihar\'s Glory-Vampires:
[img=400x200]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/32923-1-1362658985.png[/img]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32923]Castle Volkihar\'s Glory-Vampires[/url]

SkyHaven Temple Glory:
[img=400x200]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/32921-1-1362654778.jpg[/img]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32921]SkyHaven Temple Glory[/url]
